restaurant.name: Delicious Bites
restaurant.description: Experience the finest cuisine delivered straight to your doorstep. Our chefs prepare every meal with love and the freshest ingredients.

menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Fresh romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and our signature Caesar dressing

menuItems.name: Buffalo Wings
menuItems.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery and blue cheese

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection, served with roasted vegetables and lemon butter

menuItems.name: Ribeye Steak
menuItems.description: Prime cut ribeye steak cooked to your preference, served with mashed potatoes and asparagus

menuItems.name: Chicken Parmesan
menuItems.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella

menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and our homemade tomato sauce

menuItems.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menuItems.description: Creamy pasta with pancetta, eggs, parmesan cheese, and black pepper

menuItems.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic pepperoni pizza with mozzarella cheese and our signature sauce

menuItems.name: Chocolate Cake
menuItems.description: Rich, moist chocolate cake with layers of chocolate ganache

menuItems.name: Tiramisu
menuItems.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream

menuItems.name: Fresh Orange Juice
menuItems.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, no added sugar

menuItems.name: Iced Coffee
menuItems.description: Cold brew coffee served over ice with your choice of milk

features.title: Fast Delivery
features.description: Get your food delivered in 30-45 minutes

features.title: Fresh Ingredients
features.description: We use only the freshest, highest quality ingredients

features.title: Expert Chefs
features.description: Our experienced chefs prepare every dish with care

features.title: Easy Payment
features.description: Multiple payment options for your convenience
